channel.title: Comments on: The Day I was Allowed into Parliament

item.title: By: Jacquelyn Gill
item.dc:creator: Jacquelyn Gill
item.description: Excellent post. I don't necessarily have the background to follow some of the finer details of British Parliament, but I found this really interesting. It's a side of things scientists don't often get to see.
item.content:encoded: Excellent post. I don’t necessarily have the background to follow some of the finer details of British Parliament, but I found this really interesting. It’s a side of things scientists don’t often get to see.
